text: Tekken is the first game for the Tekken series, released on December 9, 1994 for arcades. It was later released on the PlayStation in 1995. Tekken had two modes, Arcade mode and VS mode. Extra modes would be added in the next games. == Characters in Tekken == * Kazuya Mishima * King * Nina Williams * Paul Phoenix * Michelle Chang * Marshall Law * Yoshimitsu * Jack * Lee Chaolan * Armor King * Anna Williams * Kuma * Kunimitsu * Wang Jinrei * Prototype Jack * Ganryu * Heihachi Mishima * Devil == Also see == * Tekken (series) Category:1995 video games Category:Tekken Category:3D fighting games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Head-to-head arcade video games Category:PlayStation games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games
title: Tekken
